name: Twilight on Yulestead
description: Break the curse on your town and yourself with only your cleric's staff and being half your normal size.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 1030 recommended for Ultra settings Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 for Ultra at 60+ FPS Storage: 1300 MB available space
